name: 2012 Counterattack
description:
This is a war game that combined "Defense" and "RTS" Genre. You must create special and unique units to conquer the aliens' base.

Thanks for smirnoffsky to help us update this game.

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★

Scenario:
- From the makers of 2012 Defense, we bring you 2012 Counterattack. This story happens after the predecessor 2012 Defense. The aliens invade aiming to re-dominate the earth with the powerful antimatter energy left from prehistory. The war doesn’t stop until human won the final war on Dec. 12, 2012. But this is not the end, you must lead your troop to wipe out all alien invaders entrenched in the United States of America.
- You can choose from a variety of devastating weapons as well as upgrade your armies and send troops. Listen to the death cries of aliens as you conquer their base.
- You must become a hero of human to save our homeland and wipe out the aliens.
- Stunning graphics and realistic sounds combine to create an immersive
experience.

Game Play:
-Tilt left or right: Adjust location of map or mini-map.
-Bottom button: Produce units

Special characteristics:
-Attack enemies with the Assistance weapons armed on the base.
-Over 18 different types of units.
-10 different upgrades for US units and weapons related.
-50 numbers of stages(50 states)
-Game Center global leaderboard
-Game Center achievement system
-Several different troop types including war machines like M270 MLRS and EX-Basher.

Upgrade:
-You can upgrade armies with the war fund you earn in the game.

Tips:
- It is very helpful to use assistance weapons effectively.
- To capture the aliens base, it is effective to produce as many units as possible.
- If you use the Particle Beam, it will bring great damage to aliens.
